ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.fragment

Interface SeriesFragment.SeriesCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity
    Enclosing class:
    SeriesFragment

    public static interface SeriesFragment.SeriesCallback
    Container Activity must implement this interface to allow GameFragment/StatsFragment to be loaded when a series is selected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCreateNewSeries(boolean isEvent)
      Called when user opts to create a new series.
      void onLeagueStatsOpened()
      Displays the stats of the current league in a new StatsFragment.
      void onSeriesSelected(Series series, boolean isEvent)
      Should be overridden to created a GameFragment with the games belonging to the series represented by seriesId.

    • Method Detail

      • onSeriesSelected

        void onSeriesSelected(Series series,
                      boolean isEvent)
        Should be overridden to created a GameFragment with the games belonging to the series represented by seriesId.
        Parameters:
        series - series whose games will be displayed
        isEvent - indicates if an event series is being displayed or not

      • onCreateNewSeries

        void onCreateNewSeries(boolean isEvent)
        Called when user opts to create a new series.
        Parameters:
        isEvent - indicates if the new series will belong to an event

      • onLeagueStatsOpened

        void onLeagueStatsOpened()
        Displays the stats of the current league in a new StatsFragment.
